dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, heard about this incident from the Ministry of Emergency Situations... quite the rescue operation, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, heard about this incident from the Ministry of Emergency Situations... quite the rescue operation, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescuers helped a tourist descend from Mount Kokshetau after she sustained injuries, according to the Ministry of Emergency Situations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the one on Mount Kokshetau, right? A tourist needed rescuing, if I remember correctly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the one on Mount Kokshetau, right? A tourist needed rescuing, if I remember correctly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescuers helped a tourist descend from Mount Kokshetau after she sustained injuries...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! She, like, climbed up but then couldn't get back down. Pretty scary, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! She, like, climbed up but then couldn't get back down. Pretty scary, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The woman had climbed Mount Kokshetau in the Burabay District but was unable to come down on her own.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that. Apparently, she was injured, and, um, a bit disoriented too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that. Apparently, she was injured, and, um, a bit disoriented too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to her injuries and disorientation, she couldnâ„¢t descend by herself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, the rescuers had to help her all the way down. Then they, uh, handed her over to an ambulance crew.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, the rescuers had to help her all the way down. Then they, uh, handed her over to an ambulance crew.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescuers helped her down and handed her over to an ambulance crew, the ministry said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, thank goodness for them, honestly. Like, imagine being stuck up there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, thank goodness for them, honestly. Like, imagine being stuck up there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And this is why, you know, officials are really urging people to follow safety precautions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And this is why, you know, officials are really urging people to follow safety precautions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescue officials urged Kazakhstani citizens to follow safety precautions when visiting the mountain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely. Especially when you're, like, out in the mountains. It's not a walk in the park.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely. Especially when you're, like, out in the mountains. It's not a walk in the park.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's not. You really gotta be prepared for anything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's not. You really gotta be prepared for anything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not the first time something like this has happened either, [interrupts] didn't we hear about that paragliding thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not the first time something like this has happened either, didn't we hear about that paragliding thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you're totally right! Yeah, there was that woman injured after a paragliding flight at Shymbulak Resort, um, not too long ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you're totally right! Yeah, there was that woman injured after a paragliding flight at Shymbulak Resort, um, not too long ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: See? So, it just goes to show, like, be careful out there, folks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: See? So, it just goes to show, like, be careful out there, folks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, stay safe and, uh, always hike with a buddy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, stay safe and, uh, always hike with a buddy.

dialogue_turns.text: Or at least tell someone where you're going!
